about_the_game:
Tank Hunter is a simulator of ATGM operators also known as tank slayers. Plan the ambush, prepare weapons, carefully choose your fighting position and the victory will be yours.

Feel the pressure of time and experience the excitement of being on the battlefield:
  • customize the equipment and your vehicle,
  • expand your base,
  • be in charge of your team members,
  • plan mission details, including: the type and the amount of needed ammunition, safe routes, the most advantageous fighting positions and many more,
  • choose the camouflage and build fortifications for the fighting position,
  • destroy the enemy targets, protect allies and patrol the area,
  • stay unnoticed and take control of the course of the war.

Plan missions

Use the mission planner on your tablet to browse and undertake available quests. Check the briefing, time, weather conditions and customize your weaponry. Use thermal imaging, anti-tank missiles and many other that can give you advantage over your opponent in any situation.

Prepare for the battle

Transport weapons and crew members to the target destination. Set up the TOW, secure the area and prepare the fighting position for any eventuality.
Don't forget the element of surprise - it's a powerful weapon in your arsenal!

Fight and win

Surprise your enemies by attacking the most crucial points. Cut off supply routes, destroy strategic locations and hunt high value targets. Remember to avoid detection. Give orders, recon the area and use your allied forces to tip the scales in your favor.

name: Tank Hunter Tow Operator
short_description: Tank Hunter is a simulator in which you play as a member of one of the elite units fighting armored vehicles and destroying high-value targets. Personalize your weapon, choose the right place, prepare your fighting position and reach for victory by destroying enemy units.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Czech, Korean, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
